quest.name: Anything You Can Do
journal:
Haermaga would explain the rules and regulations of the contest in which you are about to engage.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

Haermaga thanks you for accepting the offer to help teach the overzealous R'fhul Tia an important lesson. He then lays down the rules: the first one to accumulate four Faire vouchers will be declared the victor. Faire vouchers can be won by successfully completing any of three events: the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course, which will yield four vouchers, or the Iron Culinarian Challenge and Angling Extravaganza, which will yield one apiece. He further explains that you can take on any event as many times as you wish. With your objective clearly in mind, you set out to put on a clear demonstration of your adventuring abilities.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

Your finely honed skills allow you to make short work of the challenges of the faire, and you swiftly accumulate the four vouchers required. You deliver them to Haermaga, who declares you the victor, and further explains his reasons for proposing this contest in the first place. After a short chat, he sends you out to look for R'fhul Tia, whose failure to return has the grand chaperone concerned.

You find R'majha standing by herself on the beach. She explains that her brother is making an earnest attempt to succeed in the competition, but she is unaware of how many vouchers he has managed to procure. She mentions that she saw him talking to a particular personage standing a short ways away, and suggests that the two of you do the same in hopes of gleaning further information.

You speak with Beaudefoin, who observes that R'fhul Tia is just about to take on the Eorzean Ninja Warrior course. He offers to provide a rousing play-by-play for R'majha's benefit, then proceeds to do exactly that as R'fhul Tia soars to the start of the course with great promise...only to fall to an inglorious defeat with his very first jump. R'majha runs off, worried that her brother might be hurt, and you decide to go along to offer what aid and emotional support you may.

You find R'fhul Tia shaken and stunned but physically no worse for the wear. While he is eager to rush back out and prove that his failure just now was an aberration, his young sister convinces him to get some much-needed rest before he takes on his next challenge. Mistakenly believing that he might yet win his competition with you, he grudgingly acquiesces to her request. Resolving to join them there, you begin thinking of how to break the news to the lad gently.

You find a well-rested and refreshed R'fhul Tia ready and raring to get back out there and prove himself the more capable adventurer. His enthusiasm is somewhat dampened, however, when you tactfully inform him that, in fact, you have already obtained the necessary four vouchers and claimed your victory. Initially reacting with utter disbelief, he soon comes to the understanding that he had vastly overestimated his own abilities. Confronted with indisputable evidence that he still has a long way to go before becoming a true adventurer, he resolves to follow your advice and example. Promising his dear sister that he will be more cautious and circumspect in the future, he thanks you for providing him with inspiration and a valuable life lesson, and strikes out in search of his next adventure. Your job here done, you decide to return to Haermaga to report on the events of the day.

Haermaga is heartened by your return, and the tidings that you bring to him. He thanks you once more for serving as a model─not only to R'fhul Tia but to all the aspiring adventurers who have seen you showcase your skills at the Moonfire Faire. He offers you a healthy reward for your efforts, and invites you to return as often as you wish while the festivities are still ongoing.
objectives: Obtain Faire vouchersDeliver the Faire vouchers to Haermaga.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Thank you, friend! Your presence will go a long way in teaching the lad that there's more to being an adventurer than gallivanting about making bold and baseless proclamations. Now, without any further ado, allow me to explain the ground rules.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: The name of the game here at the Moonfire Faire is collecting Faire vouchers. These can be acquired through displays of your adventuring prowess, and subsequently redeemed for a host of enticing rewards.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: You can receive a whopping four vouchers for successfully demonstrating your high-flying acrobatic aptitude in the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course. To participate, simply speak to the course registrar standing over by the shore.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: If you're the type who'd rather keep your feet on the ground, you can also receive a single voucher each time you complete the Iron Culinarian Challenge or the Angling Extravaganza. You can take part in these by speaking to my colleagues Hildelana or J'nangho, respectively.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Should you have any other pressing questions about the festivities, Ethelia and her fellow Faire attendants would be happy to tell you more. Now, go out there and show us all─particularly a certain malapert Miqo'te─what you've got! I reckon four vouchers should be enough to put him in his place. Acquire them in whatever manner you prefer, then bring them back to me.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Enjoying the festivities, friend? Remember, once you've acquired four vouchers, come back and show them to me. Together, we'll show that cocksure lad that a true adventurer walks the walk without all the talk!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Oho! Back so soon? Let me guess...you've already acquired four vouchers for yourself?

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: One, two, three...and four!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: And all without even breaking a sweat! R'fhul Tia has yet to return, so I do believe that I can officially declare you the winner of this competition.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: ...Not that the outcome was ever in much doubt, of course. Anyhow, your decisive triumph should go a long way toward giving R'fhul Tia some much-needed perspective. Speaking of which, did you happen to see the lad out there?

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: To tell the truth, I worry for the boy. When he first came to us a few years back, all starry-eyed and gushing about how he was going to be a great adventurer, I was happy for him. After all, what is the Moonfire Faire for, if not to encourage spirited young lads like him to join the ranks of those fighting for our realm?

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: What's more, word has it that the lad lost his family. That one of the reasons he's so determined to follow this path is so he might protect his dear sister in his departed father's stead. That's why I'm all the more worried that he's in over his head.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Mind you, we all know how it feels to get a touch overeager at our first taste of success. But this lad is taking this to an entirely unhealthy extreme. If he doesn't watch out, he's going to get himself killed out there.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: ...That's why I had the idea to recruit you for this little competition. Just maybe, I thought, a small taste of failure at the hands of one of his more accomplished peers, would teach him─gently, mind you─that there was still much for him to learn.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Speaking of which, could I bother you to look around and check in on the boy? Just to ensure that he hasn't gotten himself into any trouble, that is. I'd go myself, but I'd be causing trouble myself if I abandoned my post in the middle of the festivities!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Last I heard, R'fhul Tia had a mind to take on the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course and win himself four vouchers in one fell swoop. Perhaps you could find him or his little sister over by the shore?

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Last I heard, R'fhul Tia was talking about taking on the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course. Would you be so kind as to go and check on the lad? Just to see that he hasn't gotten himself into any trouble and all...

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Oh, hello, Forename! Are you looking for Fhul?

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Hmmm... I don't know how many slips of paper he has, but I do know that he's trying really, really hard!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: I just saw him over there by the spraying water, talking to that man in the colorful clothes. Maybe he can tell you more about how Fhul is doing. I know! Why don't we go talk to him together?

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Sorry to trouble you, friend, but you're doing great service by taking your time to be a role model for the lad. The guild needs more adventurers like you.

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: And a very happy Moonfire Faire to you, little girl! I trust that you're enjoying the festivities?

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Hello, mister! Do you know where my brother went? His name is R'fhul Tia, and he's a great adventurer!

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: R'what...? Can't say the name rings any─ Ah! You must be talking about that cocksure Miqo'te lad who just dropped by a short while ago!

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: Why, if I'm not mistaken, I do believe that's him right over there. Yes, he's just about to take on the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course!

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: This is most exciting, don't you think? Ah─I've an idea! Why don't I give you a play-by-play of your brother's daring attempt at the course? That way, you can experience every death-defying leap as if you were right there with him! All right, here goes nothing!

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: Here we have our brave young challenger, R'fhul Tia! Look at the fire burning in his eyes as he readies himself for the challenge before him! Yes, the boy lacks not for confidence or determination, but will that be enough to carry him to victory today?

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: And he's off and running! There's really no need to run into the water jet, but hey, whatever floats the lad's boat. He approaches the water, and...

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: There he goes! Look at him shoot up, high, high into the sky! He flies through the air, and...!

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: ...Yes, he's landed! With remarkable balance and poise given his relative youth and inexperience, he stands safely on the starting platform, with the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course looming before him! Yes, now the true challenge begins!

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: The boy takes a few measured steps. He looks forward to the platform in front of him, and with a confident nod, he leaps, and...!

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: Gods be good! He's lost his balance on the landing! Has the Miqo'te lad's brave challenge come to a sudden, shocking end!?

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: But no...no! He's still up there!

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: Yes, he's hanging on for dear life! What strength! What remarkable resilience!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Hah! A slight miscalculation on the angle, nothing more. I'll just pull myself...right up...and...

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: Oh, the ignominy! The agony of defeat! R'fhul Tia's challenge is over, but not for lack of effort! Give the boy a round of applause!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Fhul! Fhul, are you okay!?

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Forename! We have to help Fhul!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: I bet this man can tell us how Fhul is doing!

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: I had high hopes for the lad, but alas! It would seem he still needs a bit more seasoning. No shame in that, of course. We all have to start somewhere, after all!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: <pant> <pant> Th...thank you, friend. Why...why do I feel like this isn't the first time this has happened?

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: <pant> <pant> I Th...thank you, friend. I'm not sure what happened up there. One moment the platform was underneath my feet, and the next...it wasn't.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: B-But Forename, why are you here!? We are in the midst of a heated contest, after all! You should be out there collecting vouchers, not showing sympathy for your rival!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Oh, Fhul! Are you hurt? You should rest for a bit! Here, come with me!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Rest? But I─ Ah, I suppose you're right. The contest can wait. After all, I don't expect Forename here has more than a voucher or two at this point.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Speaking of which, why don't you come along? These faire games take quite a bit out of you─I imagine you're as exhausted as I am. Yes, I do believe there should be suitable place to rest just over thereabouts.

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Fhul! Fhul, are you okay!? Speak to me, Fhul!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Ah, yes! I do believe all I needed was a little rest. Yes, just watch me! Now that I know precisely how that course works, I'm going to tear through it in record time! You'd best hurry back out there yourself, lest I get the jump on you in our little competition.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Speaking of which, Forename...have you managed to get your first voucher yet? They certainly don't make it easy...

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: QA1
dialogue.text: Actually, I have four.

dialogue.name: QA1
dialogue.text: What do you think?

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Bahahaha! That's a good one, my friend! As if any adventurer could acquire four whole vouchers in such a short...ah...er... You aren't serious...are you?

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Why, I...I'm not... Could you be saying that you already have two? But that would be... Wait...three, even? Ah...er... I'm not sure I like where this is going... You don't seriously have all four?

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: But that's impossible! Inconceivable! How could anyone acquire four vouchers so fast!?

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Wow, Forename! You're really something! Isn't shehe, Fhul?

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: This can't be! I...I realize that I'm still new to this adventuring business, but never did I think there would be such a pronounced─and quite frankly, somewhat embarrassing─difference in skill between the two of us.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: But there is no arguing with the evidence before me. I am simply in awe of your prowess, friend. You are a role model to me and anyone who has ever aspired to be an adventurer!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Why, to think I was so foolish as to think that I could compete with an honest-to-gods hero in earnest! Just thinking of it, I want to slap that brash and brazen boy in the face with a large harbor herring!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: But just you watch, Forename. I'm going to train harder than ever before, and hone my skills over time, just the way you did. One day, when I truly have the talent to back up my words, will you accept my challenge once more?

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Thank you, friend! You've given me all the inspiration I need today!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Yes, it's high time I embarked on my next adventure! Why, I do believe I'll join my companions in investigating those curious rumors surrounding Tam-Tara Deepcroft!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Hm? What's this? Majha?

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Hello, hello...Fhul?

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Yes, it's me, Majha. Whatever is the matter? You gave your big brother a fright, just running off like that...

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: I'll be a good girl and stay out of trouble, so... Just promise me you'll take me to the faire again next year, okay?

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: And promise me you'll take care of yourself, and not go anywhere too dangerous. I know you're a great adventurer, but, please... I just want you to be safe...

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Majha...

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: I promise, Majha. Your brother has learned an important lesson today. I'm going to follow in the footsteps of Forename here, and become an adventurer that you can truly be proud of.

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: I'm already proud of you, Fhul. Hey, Forename. Do you have any advice for my brother? He really looks up to you, you know.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Take one step at a time.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Don't run headlong into a horde of monsters.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: I see, I see... Start small, and gradually gain confidence and experience through small victories. Try to do too much too soon, and you'll end up dangling by a thread from certain demise...like I was just before.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: I see, I see... No matter how confident you might be, approach potentially dangerous situations with care and caution, lest you end up overmatched and overwhelmed before you know it!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Thank you ever so much, my friend! Why, I've learned so much from you today that I feel like I've already grown leaps and bounds. I can't wait to put my newfound knowledge to use in my adventures!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: And with that, I do believe that Majha and I should be off. Pray give my regards to Master Haermaga, and assure him that I've taken today's lesson to heart.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Farewell, my friend. It has been an honor and a pleasure to do battle with you. Until the day we meet again, may you have the best of fortune in your adventures!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Bye-bye, Forename! See you again someday!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Fhul had a short nap, and now he's ready to go!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Welcome back, friend! Did you manage to find R'fhul Tia? He hasn't gotten himself hurt, has he?

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: ...You don't say. Well, it sounds as if he's learned his lesson. And given how much the lad looks up to you, I reckon it's a lesson he'll not soon forget.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Be proud, friend. Adventurers like you are an inspiration to one and all─not just the boy, but everyone who's seen your exploits here at the faire today!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Ah, but before I forget! We had a special gift prepared for you to thank you for going above and beyond the call of duty. Here you go─I can't think of anyone who deserves it more!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: And with that, I should return to my duties. I leave you to enjoy the festivities. Remember, you are free to take on the challenges and showcase your skill as often as you like!
